record.field: You cannot invoice the payslip "%(payslip)s" because it will be invoiced in invoice "%(invoice)s" that already has lines. Please, confirm invoice to create a new one or delete its lines.
You cannot delete the payslip "%(payslip)s" because it is already invoiced. Please, delete or cancel the invoice before delete the payslip.
You can\'t set Working Hours to Payslip Line "%(current_line)s" because already exists line "%(existing_line)s" with hours in the same Payslip.
The product "%(product)s" used to invoice payslips doesn\'t have Expense Account.
The Payroll Contract "%(current_contract)s" overlaps with existing contract "%(overlaped_contract)s".'
You cannot change the state of contract "%(contract)s" because it has invoiced payslips.
You cannot delete the contract "%(contract)s" because it is confirmed.
